author: Dileep Adabala
comment: its not connecting with android phone       we are so sad to buy this wunderbar .please make it ok as soon as possible

author: Rohit Shrimal
comment: unable  to onboard wunderbar with this app....wunderbar not connecting to Wi-Fi  and there is no error with wrong wifi password ....

author: Bernard Pletikosa
comment: Had a few problems with changing WiFi but nothing major. I like the design.
title: Great app

comment: Worked as expected. No problems during onboarding.
title: It Works !!!

author: Paul Hopton
comment: Good clean interface. When I tried onboarding something went wrong - could be user error ;), but the app coped and managed to get my WunderBar onboarded.  Seeing the data come through even when I was outside was pretty awesome too.
title: Worked well

author: Amin Zayani
comment: Very simple app, clean interface. I had trouble with onboarding my WunderBar using my Moto G when BT was off, but then I quit the app, turned BT on, launched the app again and it worked like a charm.
title: Works on Moto G
